props.description: The content of the status component. This prop accepts any React node.
props.title: children

props.description: Specifies whether to display a dot indicator alongside the status text. When true, a dot is shown to visually represent the status.
props.title: dot

props.description:
Specifies whether the status should take up the full width of its container.
This variant is useful when you want to make a status span the entire width of its parent container.
props.title: full

props.description: Determines the visual style of the status, influencing its color scheme.
props.title: appearance

props.description: Specifies the size of the badge, controlling its dimensions.
props.title: size

props.description: Specifies the variant of the status
props.title: variant
